Factsheet

Developer:
Aestronauts
Based in NY, the United States
Release date:
Platforms:
Tempo on Steam
Tempo Demo on Steam
Website:
Regular Price:
USD 2.99
CNY 15

Description

Tempo is a Rhythm Platformer Game. But instead of staying on the beat… You make the beat!

History

Refined Plan, July 2

Realizing their passion on this project, the team decided to refine Tempo's design and take this project to the next stage

Prototype, June 18

Tempo was prototyped and brought to itch.io

Features

  • Retro Aesthetics
  • Global Leaderboard
  • Custom Level Editor

Videos

Coming soon — YouTube

Logo & Icon

There are currently no logos or icons available for Tempo. Check back later for more or contact us for specific requests!

Widgets

About Aestronauts

Boilerplate
Aestronauts is a NY based game studio looking to bring entertainment to unlikely places. We are committed to making engaging and light-hearted experiences that can be enjoyed by everyone.
